name: Facebook Wider & Flat fixed Version (15 Jan 2017)
description:
Based on: Facebook wide / flat design by AM!R
https://userstyles.org/styles/131122/facebook-wide-flat-design-by-am-r-fixed
additional_info:
Changelog (Ver. 0.3):
- Fix Search Bar *Thanks Florian DORRE*

Know Issues:
- Suggested Pages breaks with vertical images
- Blue Color Alt Link on Hovercard
- Black Background Profile Picture on Hovercard
- Gray Borders on Friend List

Future Features:
- Rework "Fan Page" Section
- Rework "Friends" Section: WIP -Step 1/3-
- Rework "Upload Profile Picture" (Remove Black Background)

--------------------------
Ver. 0.2 (15 Jan 17):
- Hide "About FB" on Profile Section
- Added Border Radius to Fanpage Picture
- Theme-Based changed to AM!R version (The iSlash version give me problems)

Version 0.1 (4 Jan 17):
- Fix Grey Border Radius (Profile Images | Chat | Hovercard)
- Rework "People You May Know" (Remove Gradient | Add Text-Shadow | Center Profiles)
- Remove Sahel Font
- Rework "Friends" -Profile Section-(WIP)

discussions.name: Top menu bar and search box issue
The blue navigation bar is too tall (height)
Cannot select "Search this group" box in groups->Discussions
